Hoarseness.context: Microscopic suspension direct laryngoscopy with biopsy of left true vocal cord stripping. Hoarseness, bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia.

bilateral true vocal cord lesions.context: INDICATIONS FOR PROCEDURE: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

leukoplakia.context: The areas of leukoplakia appeared to be cobblestoned in appearance, irregularly bordered, and very hard to the touch.

Microscopic suspension direct laryngosco.context: Microscopic suspension direct laryngoscopy with biopsy of left true vocal cord stripping. Hoarseness, bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia.

33-year-old.context: INDICATIONS FOR PROCEDURE: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

chronic hoarseness.context: INDICATIONS FOR PROCEDURE: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy.context: INDICATIONS FOR PROCEDURE: The patient is a 33-year-old Caucasian male with a history of chronic hoarseness and bilateral true vocal cord lesions, and leukoplakia discovered on a fiberoptic nasal laryngoscopy in the office.

full.context: The scope was then pulled back into the superior aspect of hypopharynx into the oropharynx and the oral cavity demonstrated no signs of any gross lesions. A bimanual examination was then performed, which again demonstrated a fullness on the left base of tongue region with no signs of any other gross lesions.

fullness.context: The false vocal cord also appeared to be very full on the left side along with fullness in the subglottic region.

edematous.context: The patient's subglottic region was very edematous and with redundant mucosal tissue.

redundant mucosal tissue.context: The patient's subglottic region was very edematous and with redundant mucosal tissue.

cobblestoned.context: The areas of leukoplakia appeared to be cobblestoned in appearance, irregularly bordered, and very hard to the touch.

Decadron.context: The patient did receive intraoperatively 10 mg of Decadron.

Medrol DOSEPAK.context: The patient will be sent home with prescriptions for Medrol DOSEPAK, Tylenol with Codeine, Elixir, and amoxicillin 250 mg per 5 cc.

Tylenol with Codeine.context: The patient will be sent home with prescriptions for Medrol DOSEPAK, Tylenol with Codeine, Elixir, and amoxicillin 250 mg per 5 cc.

amoxicillin.context: The patient will be sent home with prescriptions for Medrol DOSEPAK, Tylenol with Codeine, Elixir, and amoxicillin 250 mg per 5 cc.
